<center>![](https://i.imgur.com/gsAT9Cd.png)</center>

How's it going, folks! Cyclone Servers has been in business since 2013. We take our hosting business seriously and only want to offer our customers the best services possible and to do this, we have been recently upgrading our hardware and networking equipment so that we are ready to offer the best we can.

Test out our network with these IPs!

**NETWORK INFORMATION:**

Seattle WA:
Test IPv4:207.244.151.34

North Carolina:
Test iPv4: 23.92.219.77

Los Angeles:
Test iPv4: 69.12.86.184

**Our Features:**
Instant Activation (Subject to fraud checks)
One-click OS Install with ready templates - CentOS, Debian, Suse, Ubuntu and now Windows
Custom ISO - Use our available Windows & FreeBSD or bring your own ISO.
One-click CP Install - Available on our VPS Panel, cPanel, Plesk, Webuzo, Webmin, VestaCP and more!.

**We do have some promos:**

**52% Off (Recurring) Use Promo Code D5EORHA04I**

Promo's only valid on-base server no upgrades.

Check out our KVM Offers.

**KVM VPS:(Seattle, LA, North Carolina)**

KVM 1GB | 25 GB SSD + 1 TB Bandwidth | $3.84/mo
KVM 2GB | 35 GB SSD + 2 TB Bandwidth | $4.32/mo
KVM 4GB | 55 GB SSD + 4 TB Bandwidth | $5.28/mo

Please note these servers are unmanaged!

[Order Here](https://clients.cycloneservers.net/cart.php)

[Special]

If you purchase a server without a promo code get free management added to your server.

We have new products coming soon!

[Extras]

Now accepting CC. (Stripe) and (BTC and More Crypto) - We are willing to create custom plans or upgrade individual specifications (such as disk space) for an additional fee. - We own ALL our own hardware. With our Seattle server being a 64 core server!

DDOS Protection in all locations.

Please let us know if you have any questions. You can submit a ticket to reach a sales rep here: [Click Here to Contact Support/Sales](https://clients.cycloneservers.net/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1)

Thank you!!
